title: MAG 187 - Checking Out
itunes:title: MAG 187 - Checking Out
itunes:subtitle: Case ########-27An exploration of hospitality.Recorded by The Archivist in Situ.
description:
Case ########-27


An exploration of hospitality.


Recorded by The Archivist in Situ.


Content warnings:

  • Sudden, loud SFX
  • Emotional manipulation
  • Bullying / Taunting
  • Gaslighting
  • Disorientation (Spatial & temporal)
  • Pleading
  • Arguing
  • Second person POV
  • Perceived child neglect (inc SFX)
  • Character death


Thanks to this week's Patrons: Emmie Knobloch, ludmila schmidt, Matt1344, C-J Saunders, Myshe, Katie Stonestreet, Zoe Payne, Rebecca Field, Taga, Tamsin Myers, Conrad Schaffer Vignati, Jelka Dirksen, sleepy pigeon, Leona Maron, mo, officialspec, Maria x Zhao, Eb Mitchell, Isabel Taylor, cecilfae, Heather Cartwright, Zoe Prescott, Grace Holsten, Jessica Willmore, Beth Carter, Sarah, Null Strolight, Crystal Wang, Noah S Brown, Laura A., Dave, Trinkit, it is a mystery, Ashley S., Anna Laurie, Corina Bantum, flipwizardmcgay, Alexi Bailey, Mikki S., Emma Scrivens, Ebeth, Jordan Whiteley, Jane, Vee, Katherine Carlsrud, Wizard Perry, Abigail Bokun, Leanne Payson, MAX, Ingeborg Pedersen.


If you'd like to join them visit www.patreon.com/rustyquill


Edited this week by Annie Fitch, Elizabeth Moffatt, Brock Winstead & Alexander J Newall


Written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J Newall


Produced by Lowri Ann Davies


Performances:

- "The Archivist" - Jonathan Sims

- "Martin Blackwood" - Alexander J. Newall

- "Helen" - Imogen Harris

- "The Guest" - Jenny Haufek


Sound effects this week by 13FPanska_Cerny_Jan, AderuMoro, alienistcog, Along12, Anthousai, baryy, bennstir, bone666138, BonnyOrbit, cclaretc, cyoung510, daboy291, eminyildirim, EverydaySounds, Fission9, fmceretta, FreqMan, fritzsound, FunWithSound, Hitrison, InspectorJ, jacobsteel, jeremixogg, karinalarasart, Kinoton, klakmart, kyles, laft2k, laurenmartin236, leonelmail, lewis100011

LudwigMueller, manpriyamy, mlsulli, musicandsoundyay, nikitralala, o_ciz, Oberon81, Omar Alvarado, patchytherat, paulmessier, postworkflow, rachaelbuchanan, sacredmatt, sagetyrtle, sforsman, soundmary, SoundsForHim, SpliceSound, sturmankin, Suburbanwizard, tedlundwall, Thalamus_Lab, ThatMisfit, wavecal22, Yoyodaman234, OGsoundFX, LoafDV, YleArkisto, dobroide & previously credited artists via freesound.org 


Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com


Music

  • Corny Christmas Sitcom Opening by fmceretta available on Freesound. https://freesound.org/people/fmceretta/sounds/426704/
  • News End Signature by mansardian available on Freesound https://freesound.org/people/mansardian/sounds/61322/
  • Manic_No_Depression by Jeremy Korpas, available from the Youtube Audio Library music https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary_download?vid=949f34cb40a52f3f
  • Final_Boss by Myuu, available from the Youtube Audio Library https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary_download?vid=6bca17aa0750131e
  • Fallen_Soldier by Biz Baz Studio, available from the Youtube Audio Library music Get bonus content on Patreon
